name: Unstable Empire
description:
Manage the Empire that teeters on the edge of collapse. Send your trusty ministers out to spread your faith and your battle-thirsty armies. But don't trust them too much, who knows what they'll do behind your back.

This game was made during the 48 hours of Ludun Dare 49, with the theme "Unstable". Apart from the usual stuff: Unity, Photoshop, etc, I used NVIDIA's StyleGAN2 neural network to generate random ingame portraits.
